name: Minions & Immortals (Canceled)
blurb: Minions & Immortals is a Free to Play Social RPG for iOS with a unique mix of group-focused Action Combat, City Building and Guilds

rewards.reward: No Reward

INSIDER ============================= You will receive our deepest heartfelt thanks, but that's not all! + Kickstarter only Desktop WALLPAPER + Access to a Kickstarter only Mailing list with EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME OFFERS! ============================= REWARD NOTES: All tiers include access to the Minions & Immortals community where backers get early glimpses at the game, chat with the Devs, and take part in polls for specific game development decisions.

FLAG BEARER ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Flag bearer ============================= Exclusive Kickstarter only FLAG to fly over your city showing your support and excessive wisdom in backing our project! + DIGITAL copy of our SOUNDTRACK ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $30

EARLY BIRD - DRESSED FOR SUCCESS ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Dressed to Kill ============================= Receive a Set of KS exclusive RARE QUALITY STARTER GEAR (weapon, armor, and trinket) for your first minion! You will receive your first UPGRADED FLAG at this tier which will grant an EXP bonus to all your Minions while flying over your city! + Digital ART BOOK and All previous Tiers  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $60

DRESSED FOR SUCCESS ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Dressed to Kill ============================= Receive a Set of KS exclusive RARE QUALITY STARTER GEAR (weapon, armor, and trinket) for your first minion! You will receive your first UPGRADED FLAG at this tier which will grant an EXP bonus to all your Minions while flying over your city! + Digital ART BOOK and All previous Tiers  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $60

EARLY BIRD - RIGHTHAND MINION ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Founder ============================= Start the game with your choice of ONE KS Exclusive Tier 1 RARE quality MINION! At this tier you will also receive an UPGRADED FLAG, which in addition to providing a DEFENSIVE BONUS for your city, looks smokin\u2019 hot! And finally, you can SECURE YOUR UNIQUE IMMORTAL name before the game launches (awesome, right?), this is on a first come, first serve basis, so pledge now! + All previous Tiers ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $120

RIGHTHAND MINION ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Founder ============================= Start the game with your choice of ONE KS Exclusive Tier 1 RARE quality MINION! At this tier you will also receive an UPGRADED FLAG, which in addition to providing a DEFENSIVE BONUS for your city, looks smokin\u2019 hot! And finally, you can SECURE YOUR UNIQUE IMMORTAL name before the game launches (awesome, right?), this is on a first come, first serve basis, so pledge now! + All previous Tiers ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $120

EARLY BIRD - LONGVIEW ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Visionary ============================= LIFE-TIME 5% bonus on all purchased in-game credits (This will stack with all in-game sales and promotions, weeee!). Start the game with your choice of ONE KS Exclusive Tier 2 RARE quality MINION. An additional set of RARE QUALITY STARTER GEAR (weapon, armor, and trinket). You will also receive another FLAG, which will provide an OFFENSIVE BONUS for your city! A KS Exclusive T-SHIRT comes in at this tier as well, be the talk of the town! + All previous Tiers  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $200

LONGVIEW ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Visionary ============================= LIFE-TIME 5% bonus on all purchased in-game credits (This will stack with all in-game sales and promotions, weeee!). Start the game with your choice of ONE KS Exclusive Tier 2 RARE quality MINION. An additional set of RARE QUALITY STARTER GEAR (weapon, armor, and trinket). You will also receive another FLAG, which will provide an OFFENSIVE BONUS for your city! A KS Exclusive T-SHIRT comes in at this tier as well, be the talk of the town! + All previous Tiers  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $200

EARLY BIRD - SOCIALIZER ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Gift of Gab ============================= Have a friend or loved one you want to play with? All of the benefits of the LONGVIEW Tier are shared with one other player of your choice! Immortal name reservation for the second account is excluded. At this tier you also receive a UNIQUE Flag that grants an EXPERIENCE bonus to your Minion and anyone grouping with you! How to make friends and influence people, indeed. + All tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $200 (per account)

SOCIALIZER ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Gift of Gab ============================= Have a friend or loved one you want to play with? All of the benefits of the LONGVIEW Tier are shared with one other player of your choice! Immortal name reservation for the second account is excluded. At this tier you also receive a UNIQUE Flag that grants an EXPERIENCE bonus to your Minion and anyone grouping with you! How to make friends and influence people, indeed. + All tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $200 (per account)

EARLY BIRD \u2013 GUILD MASTER ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Dedicated Guild Master ============================= LIFE-TIME 10% bonus on all purchased in-game credits (stacks with all in-game sales and promotions, insanity??). Receive a DAY ONE UPGRADED GUILD and GUILD HALL Building, allowing you to invite 10 members. Also SECURE your GUILD\u2019S NAME before launch, first come, first serve so pledge early, pledge often!  Choose ten Guild members who will receive an additional $10 of in-game credit as well as a set of RARE QUALITY STARTER GEAR. Last, but not least, you receive a GUILD FLAG that grants everyone in your guild a LOOT DROP BONUS + All tier rewards LONGVIEW and below   ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500 + $10x10 for others

GUILD MASTER ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Dedicated Guild Master ============================= LIFE-TIME 10% bonus on all purchased in-game credits (stacks with all in-game sales and promotions, insanity??). Receive a DAY ONE UPGRADED GUILD and GUILD HALL Building, allowing you to invite 10 members. Also SECURE your GUILD\u2019S NAME before launch, first come, first serve so pledge early, pledge often!  Choose ten Guild members who will receive an additional $10 of in-game credit as well as a set of RARE QUALITY STARTER GEAR. Last, but not least, you receive a GUILD FLAG that grants everyone in your guild a LOOT DROP BONUS + All tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500 + $10x10 for others

EARLY BIRD \u2013 THE INCOMPARABLE ============================= In-Game Title Granted: The Incomparable ============================= LIFE-TIME 10% bonus on all purchased in-game credits. Like to stand out in a crowd? All of your MINIONS have the option of donning a UNIQUE KS only SKIN. Whether you choose Dominion or Discord, you will be instantly recognizable! Also choose a KS Exclusive EPIC QUALITY Starter item (Weapon, Armor, or Trinket) to help new minions get on their feet. Also included is a set of UNIQUE Immortal ICON Elements, so even your symbol will stand out. This tier's FLAG grants your minions a CRITICAL HIT bonus + All tier rewards LONGVIEW and below ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500

THE INCOMPARABLE ============================= In-Game Title Granted: The Incomparable ============================= LIFE-TIME 10% bonus on all purchased in-game credits. Like to stand out in a crowd? All of your minions have the option of donning a unique KS only skin. Whether you choose Dominion or Discord, you will be instantly recognizable! Also choose a KS Exclusive EPIC QUALITY Starter item (Weapon, Armor, or Trinket) to help new minions get on their feet. Also included is a set of UNIQUE Immortal ICON Elements, so even your symbol will stand out. This tier's FLAG grants your minions a CRITICAL HIT bonus + All tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500

THE FLAG MAKER ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Vexillographer ============================= Always wanted to get your Art in a game? This is your chance! Help design a RARE QUALITY FLAG that anyone can find and equip, and you get for free, of course. You will also receive a high quality PRINT of the flag you helped create. Receive a full set of EPIC QUALITY STARTER gear (Weapon, Armor, Trinket)! This tier comes with an additional design credit in the game! + Includes THE INCOMPARABLE tier rewards and all tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500

FAMOUS ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Famous ============================= Like the art for Minions & Immortals? Send us a picture of yourself and one of our fabulous artists will make you into the MINION of YOUR CHOICE and add you to the game for anyone to recruit (Once the piece is finished and added to the game you get a copy of yourself, for yourself<boggle>). Additionally you will receive a Digital and Physical PRINT of your portrait to do with as you please. + Includes THE INCOMPARABLE tier rewards and all tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500

ITEM, LOCATION, NPC ============================= In-Game Title Granted: World Shaper ============================= Help shape the world of Aetheria with us! Work with our design team to create an ITEM, a LOCATION, or an NPC that goes into the game for everyone to enjoy! Give us the whole thing or a general outline and let us go wild (within reason). Work through email, phone, and Skype to make sure we get your creation right (again, within reason)! To commemorate this feat you will receive a special designer credit as well as a piece of ART that DEPICTS your contribution in an epic manner! + Includes THE INCOMPARABLE tier rewards and all tier rewards LONGVIEW and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500

RABBIT\u2019S FOOT ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Rather be lucky ============================= This is a really special tier that will make you one scorching hot commodity. Choose one from a list of benefits (such as, but not limited to: +Crit, Increased Resource drops, +Experience, +Gold, +Loot) that EVERYONE in your GUILD will receive. And, just for you, an extremely UNIQUE FLAG that BOOSTS your LUCK stat. + Includes all tier rewards THE INCOMPARABLE and below ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500 + $10x10 for others

CHOSEN ONE ============================= In-Game Title Granted: The Chosen One ============================= Become truly immortalized at this tier. Your likeness will be added to the game as a NOTABLE NPC, this isn\u2019t a nobody NPC, you will show up throughout the game! Our artists will take your likeness and get you added in 2d and 3d to the game! You will also receive a Digital and Physical PRINT of the 2d art and a 3d MODEL of your NPC to stand on your desk at home! Includes special contributor mention in the credits. + Includes all tier rewards THE INCOMPARABLE and below  ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500 + $10x10 for others

THE ARCHITECT ============================= In-Game Title Granted: The Architect  ============================= Even your buildings are unique at this tier! Work with our artists to create CUSTOM SKINS for KEY BUILDINGS within your City! Work through email, phone, and Skype to get truly unique copies of your CASTLE, SHRINE, IMMORTAL\u2019S TOWER, and ONE OTHER building of YOUR CHOICE designed and implemented (within reason). You will also receive a 3d Model of your City (with custom buildings) to sit on your desk and remind you of the world of Aetheria! Also includes an HONORARY MEMBER of the DEVELOPMENT TEAM in the credits! + Includes all tier rewards THE FAMOUS and below ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500 + $10x10 for others

EPIC BOSS ============================= In-Game Title Granted: Epic Boss  ============================= If you were a boss in a game, who/what would you be? This is your opportunity to find out! At this tier you will come to our office and work with us to design a RAID or EPIC QUESTLINE that stars YOU as the CENTRAL FIGURE (within reason)! Work through email, on the phone, and finally on-site to make sure we get your story right! (must be able to arrange travel to Sacramento, CA). While you are here we'll take care of food, lodging, and generally be at your disposal. Additionally one of our amazing artists will create a work of art DEPICTING YOUR ENCOUNTER in a CLIMACTIC MOMENT. We will frame it and The Dev team will even sign it, if you want us mussing up your masterpiece! This tier also includes special mention during the OPENING CREDITS for you (or your company)! + Includes all tier rewards THE FAMOUS and below ------------------------------------------------ You receive In-Game Credits totaling: $500 + $10x10 for others
